summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating theatres and public performance therein, penny arcades, exhibitions or entertainments, and places of amusement at which moving or motion pictures are displayed or exhibited, creating an advisory committee, providing penalties for violation, and repealing Ordinance No. 28467, entitled: "An ordinance relating to and regulating theatres and public performances therein, penny arcades, exhibitions or entertainments, and places of amusement at which moving or motion pictures are displayed or exhibited, creating an advisory committee, providing penalties for violation", approved November 23, 1911, and other ordinances in so far as they are in conflict herewith.
